Matroska (MSVC)

Download

  • Download http://dl.matroska.org/downloads/libmatroska/libmatroska-0.7.7.tar.bz2

Adaptation

  • Copy %EBML_SOURCE%/ebml in %SOURCE_HOME%/ebml

Project

  • Open %SOURCE_HOME%/make/vc7/lib/vc7.sln

Project Options

  • C/C++, Language, wchar_t : Yes

Compile

  • Build Release

Install

  • Copy %SOURCE_HOME%/Matroska to Shared/Include/Matroska
  • Copy libmatroska.lib to Shared/Library/MSVC/Matroska.lib
